scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains letters; numerous checks made out to various individuals and organizations; receipts for goods and services; bills of lading; a promissory note to Spencer Graves; a memorandum of charges for wool shipped by Shryock in St. Louis, Missouri; and a telegram from Thomas Hart Hunt and Co. to Calvin Cogswell Morgan asking him to attend to drafts before leaving Lexington, Kentucky. The majority of the letters are addressed to Calvin C. Morgan and/or John Hunt Morgan of Lexington, Kentucky, from business associates discussing financial transactions and wool purchases.
